synopsis.text: Now in its seventh season, "Selection Project" is a nationally renowned reality show that serves as the ultimate launchpad for aspiring idols. One such hopeful is Suzune Miyama, who, despite a childhood marred by illness, has always found solace and inspiration in the music of legendary idol Akari Amasawa, a former contestant on the show. As Suzune enters her final year of junior high, she takes a leap of faith and auditions for "Selection Project," determined to follow in Akari's footsteps and bring joy to others through her music. However, the road to stardom is paved with challenges and fierce competition, as thousands of girls share the same dream. Will Suzune's passion and resilience be enough to make her shine among the rest and secure one of the coveted spots in the top nine? Only time will tell as the thrilling audition battle unfolds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
